Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.tron_master.tron.model.object.GameObject
com.tron_master.tron.model.object.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerAI, PlayerHuman
public abstract class Player extends GameObject
Abstract base class for all player types. Stores player state, movement, boost logic, and basic properties. Subclasses implement specific control logic (human/AI). Supports Observer pattern: listeners can be registered to receive state change notifications.

    • Player

      public Player(int x, int y, int velocityX, int velocityY, ColorValue color, String mode)
      Constructs a player instance.
      Parameters:
      x - Initial x coordinate
      y - Initial y coordinate
      velocityX - Initial velocity in x direction
      velocityY - Initial velocity in y direction
      color - Player color
      mode - Game mode ("story", "survival", "twoPlayer")

      public void accelerate()

    • addBoost

      public void addBoost(int amount)
      Adds boost to the player's boost count. Updates both the player's internal count and GameData for UI display.
      Parameters:
      amount - Amount of boost to add

    • setPlayerSlot

      public void setPlayerSlot(int playerSlot)
      Assign this player's slot number (two-player mode).
      Parameters:
      playerSlot - slot index (1 or 2)

    • setX

      public void setX(int x)
      Sets the player's x coordinate directly. Used by Portal for teleportation.

    • setY

      public void setY(int y)
      Sets the player's y coordinate directly. Used by Portal for teleportation.
      Parameters:

    • clearPath

      public void clearPath()
      Clears the player's movement path (trail). Used after teleportation to avoid visual glitches.
